title: Become a speaker
heading:
BECOME
A SPEAKER
text: The mission with Tech Imprint Arena is to make the society aware of the technology development, how it will make the world a better place and impact the way we live our daily life. We believe that the most impact will be when everyone is aware and have knowledge about what is coming, that is when technological solutions really will make a difference!
Do your company work with the latest technology AND do you use it to create a better tomorrow?
We need role models like you!
